attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr. Lee has been in more films than any actor in the world. Indeed he is a living legend. A precursory glimpse on the internet will show how many people are all asking the same question - when will Christopher lee get knighted. He is one of Britain's most outstanding thespians. When so many others who have contributed less in this field have been knighted, why not him?

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
